body:
Love you all over two times the dislikes than likes in my videos thanks for support u guys are crazy
P.S ik Honours was responsible for 1 dislike (idgaf really tho) if not all of the dislikes...
Thanks for support ilu really avicus best community :D

title: Thanks For The Support

replies.body:
to improve with montages:

i wouldn't put an intro in for a montage.

choose a good song, that has a distinct beat.


sync scene changes or gameplay with music

best stuff.

watch my montages at Sritch Gaming for maybe an average example idk I'm also too lazy for linking just put it into you tube



keep trying your vids will improve over time as you learn more. My vids are stil trash though xd
